critique: The document expresses concern and determination regarding the situation in South Sudan. It aims to convey a sense of urgency and resolve in addressing the threats to peace, security, and human rights. The language is formal and legalistic, but the underlying emotions are palpable. Initial scores: Joy (1), Sadness (5), Fear (6), Disgust (5), Surprise (3). Revised scores: Joy (1), Sadness (6), Fear (7), Disgust (6), Surprise (4).
